name: Serial_samsung_ED32D
tagline: Proyecto para controlar Monitor Samsung Via rs-232
body:
# Rs232 --> Samsung
Scripts en python 2.7 para control de monitor Samsung ED32D vÃ­a rs-232

[Controles Pantalla](https://github.com/inakidml/SerialSamsungED32/tree/master/control_pantalla)


### pySerial

Es necesario el paquete [pySerial](http://pythonhosted.org/pyserial/pyserial_api.html)


### Para instalar paquetes de python en windows

[Download get-pip](https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py)

```
c:\>get-pip.py
```
```
c:\>get-pip.py pyserial
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
